latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Survey for Assessment of Rural Socio-Economic Conditions in China (2004 - 2005)

dsDescriptionValue.value: To examine and analyze the growth of rice production, economic inefficiency, as well as yield gaps caused by inefficiently using existing resources and technology in China.

keywordValue.value: household composition, land utilization, agronomic practices, sources of credit, and marketing of farm products

fields.value: Subject: Number of Respondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 638;

value: Four villages in the provinces of Zhejiang, Hunan and Jiangxi
